hero.name: Rodrigo Teixeira de Andrade
hero.title: Frontend Developer & Fullstack Specialist
hero.subtitle: Angular Specialist with 4+ years of experience
hero.description: Developing scalable, high-performance web applications. Expertise in Angular, TypeScript, microfrontend architecture, and agile practices in multidisciplinary international environments.

about.bio: Frontend Developer with 4+ years of experience and nearly 1 year in Fullstack, specialized in scalable web applications. Proven expertise in Angular (v13–20), TypeScript, RxJS, Angular Material, and responsive design. Hands-on experience with CI/CD (GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps), SOLID principles, automated testing, and quality assurance with SonarQube. Currently contributing to Entain's global sports betting platform, working with multidisciplinary teams across Brazil, India, Canada, and England.

experiences.position: Frontend Developer – Global Sporting Bet and Casino Project
experiences.description: Developing high-performance web applications in Angular for the global sports betting and casino platform. Responsible for scalable frontend solutions for global markets. Collaboration in international agile environment with daily technical discussions and sprint ceremonies in English.

experiences.position: Full Stack Developer – Global Santander Project
experiences.description: Developing and maintaining high-performance web applications in a global banking environment. Contributions in frontend and backend solutions, following API-first principles. Achieved 25-40% reduction in loading time, 70% reduction in development time, and resolved 40+ critical tickets.

Maintaining high-performance Angular web applications for Santander's global banking platform. Led microfrontend adoption across multiple countries. Performance optimization reducing redundant API calls from 15 to 2-5.

Development and support of internal platforms and intranet solutions in Angular. Intranet renovation for 1,500+ users with 65% adoption increase. Increased test coverage from 40% to 80% and reduced loading time by 40%.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Complete e-commerce platform developed in Angular with optimized checkout and admin panel.

projects.title: Dashboard Analytics
projects.description: Interactive dashboard with real-time data visualization, dynamic charts, and customizable reports.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Task management application with drag-and-drop, real-time notifications, and team collaboration.

projects.title: Social Media Platform
projects.description: Social network with dynamic feed, post system, comments, and instant messaging.
